reviews.review:
pretty fun and a good time killer, the servers are usually pretty populated and fun to play on but the hit boxes are massive and the settings are somewhat difficult to configure (could just be me, idk)

overall i'd recommend it, if you don't mind being called a b!@#h by some Argentinian guy with over 3000 hours that may or may not have an aimbot or lagging out mid-game because the admin has been running the server for 3 days straight without resetting it
good game feels way better the csgo

gmod textures
good and probably the best counter strike yet
Very good game, if you are looking for a fun game to play with a few friends then this is it.

Dieses Spiel ist nur wichtig für Leute die Garrys Mod oder ähnliches Spielen, wegen den Source Inhalten. Zum Spiel selber kann ich nur aus meiner Erfahrung sagen, das es nicht so aktiv gespielt wird, und sich tatsächlich der Kauf auch nicht mehr lohnt
CS spiele ich seit der ersten Beta. Ich muss sagen das ich sehr positiv über Die neuen CS Games sprechen kann. Weiter so!

super recomendo este jogo, faz você passar horas na frente do computador sem ao menos perceber, fora as amizade que voce faz dentro do jogo. Um jogo altamente competitivo e serio, porem ao mesmo tempo é divertido e engraçado. tudo dependerá de você ser um bom jogador no sentido de ser passivo e ter carisma, pois quando se tem isso você com certeza passara horas jogando...
не оптимизированный для мака кусок говна 10/10

Хочу написать отзыв об этой замечательной игре. Начал играть еще в далеком 2013 когда мне было еще(!!!) 7 лет. Именно тогда я начал играть,причем очень много играть в КС,мне тогда были не знакомы механики,да и разбираться особо не хотелось,поэтому я начал играть не на пабликах,а а "Зомби режимы" и "Death Run",потом поплатился,это очень отразилось на моем скиле в будущем. Так вот. 
Сама игра шикарная. Звуки даже для сегодняшнего дня-отличные,тянет даже на моей микроволновке. Оружие прекрасно чувствуется. Вообщем,все отлично и хорошо. Жаль,что все то наследие CS Source и 1.6. так плохо прижилось в CS GO
No cheaters. No shit. Best Game.

oyun ne kadar pek sevilmiyor olsa da ben çok beğendim galiba bende bir anormallik var :) neyse siz yinede bir deneyin eğer kötü bir bilgisayarınız varsa grafikleri en düşük yapınca oynatıyor kendini mesela ben csgo da en düşük ayarlarda 30 40 fps alıyorum ama burda en düşük yapınca 180 190 fps alıyorum. (ekran kartım hd 5450 :(   )
O.G. cs aside from 1.6. ez one deag headshots because of the hitbox, overpowered bhopping mechanics. 11/10 would phoon again
Убить время? Нет играл в нее 3-4 года, и походу не зря)
I love it. Its become a way to unwind, learn and relax.
me gusto muco muy buenos graficos buenos mapas muy entretenido lo unico que no me gusto fueron las armas hay muy pocas pero si tiene variedad
its fun game 10/10 would counter-strike: source again.
Heb dit soort dingen echt gedaan goeie training....kct roosendaal
got killed by a guy in a surf server, he played a custom gangnam style mp3 and i felt humiliated, 2/10 too much water
el juego esta basicamente muerto menos por los brasucas del re orto que son un desperdicio de aire y comida
Jogo bom. Não é tão pesado, porem necessita de um PC médio pra rodar bem. Recomendo pois da para se divertir
This is my personal best shooter of all time!
The gunplay is better than in go :)
CSS и CS 1.6, классика - ничего лишнего. В GO слишком много намудрили.
My favorite FPS of all time. Please make another Counter-Strike!
It's more than just gmod textures
魔一般的吸引力，总喜欢没事来玩两局...
Eskileri yad etmek için gayet iyi oyun.
超级棒！！！！配置要求也不高！！！适合开黑!!!!!!吹爆！！！！！！！！！
o melhor jogo na minha opniao
Still good after all these years. Community is as toxic as day one. War never changes
played this for now 12 years gg

A less serious version of Counter strike . For hardcore play, i always go for cs 1.6 and when im looking for fun  cs source is the game to be. Nice graphic , beautiful maps. If you are looking for multiplayer, you need to find them in gametracker and there are some servers with lots of players. Game like zombie escape and de dust 24/7 is the one i played the most here.
